languages.text: "...Температура внутри скафандров достигла 92 градусов, что привело к обширным ожогам. Неисправностей в снаряжении не обнаружено".

traits.locale_text: "...Температура внутри скафандров достигла 92 градусов, что привело к обширным ожогам. Неисправностей в снаряжении необнаружено". {n}Заметив ваше внимание, солдат осекается и возвращается к работе.{/n}

languages.text: "...The temperature inside the void suits rose to 92 degrees, causing severe burns. No defects were discovered in the equipment."
languages.original_text: "...Температура внутри скафандров достигла 92 градусов, что привело к обширным ожогам. Неисправностей в снаряжении не обнаружено".

traits.locale_text: "The temperature inside the void suits rose to critical levels, which caused severe burns. No defects were discovered in the equipment."
"The temperature inside the void suits rose to critical levels, which caused severe burns. No defects were discovered in the equipment."
"...The temperature inside the void suits rose to 92 degrees, causing severe burns. No defects were discovered in the equipment."
"...The temperature inside the void suits rose to 92 degrees, causing severe burns. No defects were discovered in the equipment."
"...The temperature inside the void suits rose to 92 degrees, causing severe burns. No defects were discovered in the equipment."
"...The temperature inside the void suits rose to 92 degrees, causing severe burns. No defects were discovered in the equipment."

languages.text: « ... La température à l'intérieur des scaphandres est montée à 92 degrés, provoquant de graves brûlures. Après vérification, l'équipement ne présentait aucun défaut. »
languages.original_text: "...The temperature inside the void suits rose to 92 degrees, causing severe burns. No defects were discovered in the equipment."

traits.locale_text: « ... La température à l'intérieur des scaphandres est montée à 92 degrés, provoquant de graves brûlures. Après vérification, l'équipement ne présentait aucun défaut. »

languages.text: “……虚空服的内部温度上升到了92度，里面的人被严重烧伤，但设备中没有发现任何问题。”
languages.original_text: "...The temperature inside the void suits rose to 92 degrees, causing severe burns. No defects were discovered in the equipment."

traits.locale_text: “……虚空服的内部温度上升到了92度，里面的人被严重烧伤，但设备中没有发现任何问题。”

languages.text: "Die Temperatur in den Raumanzügen stieg auf 92 Grad an, was zu schweren Verbrennungen geführt hat. Es wurden keine Fehler in der Ausrüstung entdeckt."
languages.original_text: "...The temperature inside the void suits rose to 92 degrees, causing severe burns. No defects were discovered in the equipment."

traits.locale_text: "Die Temperatur in den Raumanzügen stieg auf 92 Grad an, was zu schweren Verbrennungen geführt hat. Es wurden keine Fehler in der Ausrüstung entdeckt."

languages.text: «... La temperatura del interior de los trajes del vacío aumento a 92 grados, provocando quemaduras graves. Pero no encontraron fallos en el equipo».
languages.original_text: "...The temperature inside the void suits rose to 92 degrees, causing severe burns. No defects were discovered in the equipment."

traits.locale_text: «... La temperatura del interior de los trajes del vacío aumento a 92 grados, provocando quemaduras graves. Pero no encontraron fallos en el equipo».

languages.text: 「…ヴォイドスーツ内部の温度は92度に上昇し、重度の火傷を負った。装置に不具合は発見されていない」
languages.original_text: "...The temperature inside the void suits rose to 92 degrees, causing severe burns. No defects were discovered in the equipment."

traits.locale_text: 「…ヴォイドスーツ内部の温度は92度に上昇し、重度の火傷を負った。装置に不具合は発見されていない」

languages.text: "Uçsuz giysilerinin içindeki sıcaklık 92 dereceye kadar çıkarak ciddi yanıklara sebep oldu. Ekipmanlarda bir kusur görülmedi."
languages.original_text: "...The temperature inside the void suits rose to 92 degrees, causing severe burns. No defects were discovered in the equipment."

traits.locale_text: "Uçsuz giysilerinin içindeki sıcaklık 92 dereceye kadar çıkarak ciddi yanıklara sebep oldu. Ekipmanlarda bir kusur görülmedi."
